 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָגַד‎</span>] **verb** ==prostrate oneself== in worship (only [[Isa.44.46|Isa 44:46]]) (perhaps Aramaic loan-word in Hebrew, compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xli (1887), 719</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְגֵב‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, so Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סגד‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (Sachau) [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>328</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> all ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be lowly, submissive, prostrate oneself in prayer***, etc., <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***mosque***, Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מסגדא‎</span> ***shrine*** (?) [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>152. 328</sup>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = Arabic; compare [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 165</sup>; Heid. 141); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְגּוֺד לוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.44.17|Isa 44:17]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ***he prostrateth himself to it*** (an idol; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְגָּדלֿוֺ‎</span>; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁתַּחוּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְפַּלֵּל‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסְגָּדלָֿ֑מוֺ‎</span> v[[Isa.44.15|Isa 44:15]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁתָּ֑חוּ‎</span>); 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבוּל עֵץ אֶסְגּוֺד‎</span> v[[Isa.44.19|Isa 44:19]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְגְּדוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַףיִֿשְׁתַּחֲווּ‎</span> [[Isa.46.6|Isa 46:6]] (absolute). — compare Biblical Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְגִד‎</span>. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִגִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִגִּים‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִיג‎</span> below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוג‎</span>.
